title: Class Review & Balance Suggestions (spoilers obviously) :: Crystal Project General Discussions
author: Ryan Bonerius View Profile View Posts
description: First off, thank you for the recent balance patch. It fixed a number of issues and is a huge step in the right direction. I completed most of the endgame bonus bosses after the balance patch, and have done a fair amount of testing of all the class options and builds I could come up with, and discussed them with friends who have done the same in the writing of this review. This is a wonderful game and I think with a bit of ongoing polish it could easily be an all-time great.
